name: Let There Be Humans
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 and was inspired by mythology from different civilization. The theme was "Let There Be Chaos".

You will play the frst human and you will make choices that will affect the rest of mankind. It will depend on you whether Choas o Order will preveil. 

(This is game is unfinished du to lack of time and too chaotic management)

Hopefully the idea gets through the bugs.

(A few breaking bugs are know, don't touch the same cat too many times...)
